text: how can I insert a `&nbsp;` (no-break-space) in Documenter-markdown and have it rendered correctly? I want to avoid a line-break in a table-header.

elements.text: (no-break-space) in Documenter-markdown and have it rendered correctly? I want to avoid a line-break in a table-header.

text:
You could try inserting
```00A0```
manually? The method for inserting Unicode glyphs varies by platform/editor, of course.
